typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double,
		InternationalAviation as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Aviation
source(output(
		{_c0} as string,
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GroundTransport
source(output(
		{_c0} as string,
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Industry
source(output(
		{_c0} as string,
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Power
source(output(
		{_c0} as string,
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Residential
source(output(
		Date as date,
		World as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> InternationalShipping
Aviation derive(Aviation = China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW+InternationalAviation) ~> Sum1
GroundTransport derive(GroundTransport = China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW) ~> Sum2
Industry derive(Industry = China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW) ~> Sum3
Power derive(Power = China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW) ~> Sum4
Residential derive(Residential = China+India+US+{EU27&UK}+Russia+Japan+Brazil+ROW) ~> Sum5
Sum1 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		Aviation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Sum2 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		GroundTransport
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Sum3 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		Industry
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Sum4 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		Power
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Sum5 select(mapColumn(
		{_c0},
		Residential
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
